Community introductions

PART
content.en:
Introductions

PART

content.cn:
3am Club又叫麻音俱乐部，是一个由加密追随者共同创立的社群。
3am Club社群是华语加密社群最具潜力的社群之一，现在3am Club已经集聚了华语加密圈100多位一线KOL，DiFi Degens、NFT 收藏家、项目Mod，优质赛道的投研专员，以及粉丝辐射总量超百万的海量加密爱好者。

关于3am Club

https://my3am.xyz

https://Twitter.com/my3amclub

http://discord.gg/VFt89f7Snp

Community profile

社区简介

https://t.me/my3amclub
content.en:
3am Club, also known as Mayin club，is  a community co-founded by crypto followers.
We have gathered more that 100 crypto KOLs, with over 1 million followers including Defi degens, NFT collector, project  mods, researchers in the crypto field.

About  3am Club

https://my3am.xyz

https://Twitter.com/my3amclub

http://discord.gg/VFt89f7Snp

About  Community

http://t.me/my3amclub

content.cn:
Community value

社区价值

我们同时也在积极发掘新项目，助力新项目的孵化、运营、以及传播。运用多种定制方案，助力项目成长。我们是华语加密圈成长最快的社区。

我们每日分享最新的行业资讯，各领域KOL的加持分享，NFT Free-mint信息推送，银河项目的OAT，定期的AMA活动，项目转发抽奖，最新项目的IDO/私募等，来促进项目和社群用户的发展。

价值最大化的传播者

We   Can   Do   More  Than  You  Can  Imagine
content.en:
Our values

We are also concentrating on helping new project, apply multi methods to help projects to grow.

We share the latest information about crypto industry, including precious KOL opinions, NFT free mint push, regular AMAs, Twitter pick, insight project research report, to better communicate between followers and projects.

Maximizing Values

We   Can   Do   More  Than  You  Can  Imagine

合作方式

Cooperation mode
content.en: Partners

content.cn:
3am Club在助力项目发展上，有着丰富的经验。我们可以提供多种形式的合作方式，帮助项目孵化、落地、运营、推广，扩大项目的知名度。

What we can do

可以提供的支持

01

参与多个项目的大使，来帮项目提供建议以及制定推广方案

项目推动

02

运用3amClub的资源优势，帮助优质项目，完成私募/融资情况

项目媒介

03

帮项目方以及媒体做衔接，寻找到适合的媒体以及KOL
推动项目发展

项目媒介

04

项目推广

通过社区媒体宣发，KOL转发抽奖，AMA，以及表单抽奖，银河任务等形式，扩大项目影响力

05

项目代运营

根据项目特点，定制独有的运营方案，不止局限于运营DC，Twitter等媒体平台

content.cn:
Reference case 1

案例参考一

Galaxy Brain作为银河计划中重要的部分，社群KOL紧密跟随项目运营的不同阶段，并对用户所关注的问题，提供建设性意见帮助产品功能上进行更新迭代。并持续不断地在社交平台给予曝光，给项目带来源源不断的流量以及关注度，对项目的发展起着关键性作用。

Galaxy Brain

content.cn:
案例参考二

Binance重点孵化的3A链游

3am Club是UItiverse 3A链游项目合作的首个华人社区，项目方由币安实验室重点孵化，获得红杉资本等机构共1000万融资，在跟3am Club 负责了UItiverse NFT寿命的推广合作，目前持续深度合作中。

Reference case 2
content.en:
Case 1

Galaxy Brain is an important part of the Galaxy Plan. Community KOLs closely follow the different stages of project operation, and provide constructive opinions on issues that users are concerned about to help update and iterate on product functions. It plays a key role in the development of the project.

Galaxy Brain

Reference case 2

案例参考二

3am Club联合多名KOL举办白名单抽奖活动，激励用户参与活动中来，通过此次活动给项目带来了巨大的曝光量话题参与热度

01
content.en:
AAA Game Invested by Binance

Ultiverse is incubated my Binance Labs and received a total of 10 million funds from Sequoia Capital.
My 3am Club is the FIRST Chinese community to cooperate with Ultiverse, and we’ve are till the long partner of Ultiverse.

CASE 2

01

content.cn:
案例参考三

Reference case 3

3am Club 共联合50余名一线的KOL为CryptoSimeji做了转发抽奖的推广方案，整个项目参与转发数据总量10000+，整体曝光度达百万。CryptoSimeji汇聚了大量的关注度，以及话题度成为整个华语项目的焦点。

百度的日本子公司推出的日本国民级输入法 Simeji App 的 IP 小蘑菇作为原型，创造的像素风小蘑菇 NFT 头像，3amClub负责了该项目推特的推广，取得了巨大的反响。

CryptoSimeji

合作成果
content.en:
3am VIP pass holders get to mint specific role to get a better involvement in the project.

02

We established a player group. And invite people who obtained the whitelist  to share the strategies of game. Users in this group late purchased a large number of Electric Sheep NFT.

03

Case 2

Reference case 4

3am Club可以和项目方举办联合AMA，以下为几场AMA实际案例。

3am Club与XEN 创始人Jack Levin 的AMA，了解XEN项目

3am Club与web3社交平台Debox 的联合AMA
content.en:
As the prototype of Simeji App, a Japanese national input method launched by Baidu's Japanese subsidiary, the IP small mushroom created the NFT avatar of the pixel wind small mushroom, and 3amClub was responsible for the promotion of the project's Twitter, which has achieved great response

3am Club, together with more than 50 front-line KOLs, made a promotion plan for CryptoSimeji to forward lottery. The total amount of data forwarded in the whole project was 10000+, and the overall exposure reached one million. CryptoSimeji has gathered a lot of attention, and the topic has become the focus of the whole Chinese project.

content.cn:
Investment and financing

投资与融资

3amClub 同时致力与投资和孵化Web3领域项目。我们寻找和支持那些具有创新性和颠覆性的区块链技术和加密货币项目，为投资者提供早期投资机会，并助力项目团队实现推广并在社区文化获得大量的曝光。
content.en:
Investment and financing

We can support the early project both with found and other kinds of resources. Details can be discussed depending on the circumstances.

content.en:
Investment and financing

投资与融资

3amClub is also committed to investing in and incubating projects in the Web3 field. We seek out and support innovative and disruptive blockchain technology and cryptocurrency projects, providing early investment opportunities for investors, and helping project teams to gain extensive exposure in the community culture.

content.cn:
Community activities

社区活动

我们不仅仅是一群web3的体验者，也是一群有爱的家人。除了分享最新的优质项目，VIP包房不定期的红包奶茶福利，以及娱乐活动。

PASS卡用户不定期的抽奖，奶茶/白单福利，红包拿到手软

麻音嘉年华娱乐晚会，大家一起唱歌玩游戏讲笑话
